issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Fix null bitmap comparisons in roundtrip tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10225](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10225). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Arrow spec allows makes the null bitmap optional if an array has no nulls `[~carols10cents]`, so the tests that were failing were because we're comparing `None` with a 100% populated bitmap.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10225?focusedCommentId=17210279) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8388
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8388>
